products.title: New Cortado
products.text: Three ristretto shots of Starbucks® Blonde Espresso combined with steamed whole milk and served in an 8 fl oz short cup.

products.title: New Brown Sugar Oatmilk Cortado
products.text: Three ristretto shots of Starbucks® Blonde Espresso, brown sugar syrup, cinnamon and steamed oatmilk in an 8 fl oz short cup.

products.title: Paradise Drink Starbucks Refreshers® Beverage
products.text: A tropical blend of real pineapple pieces, passionfruit accents and coconutmilk.

products.title: Pink Drink Starbucks Refreshers® Beverage
products.text: Flavors of passionfruit and açaí, real strawberry pieces and coconutmilk come together.

products.title: New Cinnamon Caramel Cream Nitro Cold Brew
products.text: Velvety Nitro Cold Brew, now with cinnamon and caramel notes and silky cold foam.

products.title: Brown Sugar Oatmilk Shaken Espresso
products.text: Starbucks® Blonde espresso is hand-shaken with brown sugar and cinnamon notes and then finished with oatmilk.

products.title: Impossible™ Breakfast Sandwich
products.text: An Impossible™ Sausage Patty Made From Plants, a cage-free fried egg and Cheddar on a sesame ciabatta bun.*

products.title: Kale & Mushroom Egg Bites
products.text: Sous-vide style cage-free eggs with kale, portabella mushrooms and Monterey Jack cheese.
